channel.title: [PI/DSPK] Alternative to @str@
channel.description: Is there an alternative to @str@ because @str@ crashes my client error: [code]Wild Wildy is loading.. Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded Compressed Models.. Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 sendPacket185(2458) Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 sendPacket185(29172) sendPacket185(29172) Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8217 at RSFont.getTextWidth(RSFont.java:90) at RSFont.method382(RSFont.java:75) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10361) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10139) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:10914) at client.method146(client.java:14911) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9952) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10847) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6095) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
